Class DocumentControllerTests

java.lang.Object
kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentControllerTests
@SpringBootTest(webEnvironment=RANDOM_PORT) @AutoConfigureMockMvc class DocumentControllerTests extends Object
Tests for the Document Controller, verifying access control to document endpoints based on user roles and authentication.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DocumentControllerTests()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    shouldGetDocument(String classificationLevel, String role)
    Verifies that an authorized user with the specified role can access the document endpoint and receive the expected response.
    (package private) void
    shouldNotGetDocumentWhenIncorrectRoleProvided(String classificationLevel, String role)
    Verifies that an authorized user with an incorrect role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.
    (package private) void
    shouldNotGetDocumentWhenNoRoleProvided(String classificationLevel)
    Verifies that an unauthorized user without any role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.

  • Method Details

    • shouldGetDocument

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"official, ROLE_OFFICIAL","restricted, ROLE_RESTRICTED","confidential, ROLE_CONFIDENTIAL","secret, ROLE_SECRET"}) @DisplayName("\ud83d\udfe9 should get document") void shouldGetDocument(String classificationLevel, String role) throws Exception
      Verifies that an authorized user with the specified role can access the document endpoint and receive the expected response.
      Parameters:
      classificationLevel - the classification level of the document
      role - the role of the user
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the request or response validation

    • shouldNotGetDocumentWhenIncorrectRoleProvided

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"official, ROLE_RESTRICTED","official, ROLE_CONFIDENTIAL","official, ROLE_SECRET","restricted, ROLE_OFFICIAL","restricted, ROLE_CONFIDENTIAL","restricted, ROLE_SECRET","confidential, ROLE_OFFICIAL","confidential, ROLE_RESTRICTED","confidential, ROLE_SECRET","secret, ROLE_OFFICIAL","secret, ROLE_RESTRICTED","secret, ROLE_CONFIDENTIAL"}) @DisplayName("\ud83d\udfe5 should not get document when incorrect role provided") void shouldNotGetDocumentWhenIncorrectRoleProvided(String classificationLevel, String role) throws Exception
      Verifies that an authorized user with an incorrect role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.
      Parameters:
      classificationLevel - the classification level of the document
      role - the incorrect role of the user
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the request or response validation

    • shouldNotGetDocumentWhenNoRoleProvided

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"official","restricted","confidential","secret"}) @DisplayName("\ud83d\udfe5 should not get document when no role provided") void shouldNotGetDocumentWhenNoRoleProvided(String classificationLevel) throws Exception
      Verifies that an unauthorized user without any role is forbidden from accessing the document endpoint and receives an HTTP 403 Forbidden status.
      Parameters:
      classificationLevel - the classification level of the document
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the request or response validation
